level3Ability.description: Hurt: Give one random friend +9  attack and +9  health.

level1Ability.description: Two friends faint: Deal 4  damage to one random enemy.

level2Ability.description: Two friends faint: Deal 8  damage to one random enemy.

level3Ability.description: Two friends faint: Deal 12  damage to one random enemy.

level1Ability.description: Buy & Sell: Give one random friend +2  attack and +2  health.

level2Ability.description: Buy & Sell: Give one random friend +4  attack and +4  health.

level3Ability.description: Buy & Sell: Give one random friend +6  attack and +6  health.

level1Ability.description: Start of battle: Summon one 12/12 Orangutan with the same food perk as this.

level2Ability.description: Start of battle: Summon one 24/24 Orangutan with the same food perk as this.

level3Ability.description: Start of battle: Summon one 36/36 Orangutan with the same food perk as this.

level1Ability.description: Faint: Gain +8 Trumpets.

level2Ability.description: Faint: Gain +16 Trumpets.

level3Ability.description: Faint: Gain +24 Trumpets.

level1Ability.description: Faint: Spend up to 10 trumpets and deal triple as damage to one random enemy.

level2Ability.description: Faint: Spend up to 10 trumpets and deal triple as damage to two random enemies.

level3Ability.description: Faint: Spend up to 10 trumpets and deal triple as damage to three random enemies.

level1Ability.description: Eats food: Swallow the left-most shop pet and release it as level 1 after fainting.

level2Ability.description: Eats food: Swallow the left-most shop pet and release it as level 2 after fainting.

level3Ability.description: Eats food: Swallow the left-most shop pet and release it as level 3 after fainting.

level1Ability.description: Faint: Summon three 3/2 Pigs.

level2Ability.description: Faint: Summon three 6/4 Pigs.

level3Ability.description: Faint: Summon three 9/6 Pigs.

level1Ability.description: Before attack: Gain +1 Gold on next turn. Works 3 times per battle.

level2Ability.description: Before attack: Gain +2 Gold on next turn. Works 3 times per battle.

level3Ability.description: Before attack: Gain +3 Gold on next turn. Works 3 times per battle.

level1Ability.description: Faint: Give this pet's attack to one random friend.

level2Ability.description: Faint: Give this pet's attack to two random friend.

level3Ability.description: Faint: Give this pet's attack to three random friend.

level1Ability.description: Friend summoned: Give it +1 . Except other Alpacas! Work 2 times per turn.

level2Ability.description: Friend summoned: Give it +2 . Except other Alpacas! Work 2 times per turn.

level3Ability.description: Friend summoned: Give it +3 . Except other Alpacas! Work 2 times per turn.

level1Ability.description: End turn: Give current and future shop pets +2  attack and +2  health.

level2Ability.description: End turn: Give current and future shop pets +4  attack and +4  health.

level3Ability.description: End turn: Give current and future shop pets +6  attack and +6  health.

level1Ability.description: Faint: Summon one level 1 copy of a random friendly pet. Except other Tapirs!

level2Ability.description: Faint: Summon one level 2 copy of a random friendly pet. Except other Tapirs!

level3Ability.description: Faint: Summon one level 3 copy of a random friendly pet. Except other Tapirs!

level1Ability.description: Faint: Give 1 random friend  Peanuts.

level2Ability.description: Faint: Give 2 random friends  Peanuts.

level3Ability.description: Faint: Give 3 random friends  Peanuts.

level1Ability.description: Start of battle: Give the nearest friend behind +3 Experience

level2Ability.description: Start of battle: Give the two nearest friends behind +3 Experience

level3Ability.description: Start of battle: Give the three nearest friends behind +3 Experience

level1Ability.description: Start of turn: If this has a level 3 friend. Gain 3  gold.

level2Ability.description: Start of turn: If this has a level 3 friend. Gain 6  gold.

level3Ability.description: Start of turn: If this has a level 3 friend. Gain 9  gold.

level1Ability.description: End turn: Give friends ahead +1  and +1  and then shuffle their positions.

level2Ability.description: End turn: Give friends ahead +2  and +2  and then shuffle their positions.

level3Ability.description: End turn: Give friends ahead +3  and +3  and then shuffle their positions.

level1Ability.description: Faint: Summon one random Faint pet from any pack.

level2Ability.description: Faint: Summon two random Faint pets from any pack.

level3Ability.description: Faint: Summon three random Faint pets from any pack.

level1Ability.description: End turn: Gain +1 attack and +1 health for each tier 5 pet or higher in the shop.

level2Ability.description: End turn: Gain +2 attack and +2 health for each tier 5 pet or higher in the shop.

level3Ability.description: End turn: Gain +3 attack and +3 health for each tier 5 pet or higher in the shop.

level1Ability.description: Hurt & Faint: Give friends +3 attack.

level2Ability.description: Hurt & Faint: Give friends +6 attack.

level3Ability.description: Hurt & Faint: Give friends +9 attack.

level1Ability.description: Before Attack: Gain Melon. Works 1 time per battle.

level2Ability.description: Before Attack: Gain Melon. Works 2 times per battle.

level3Ability.description: Before Attack: Gain Melon. Works 3 times per battle.

level1Ability.description: Hurt: Summon one random tier 1 pet as a 8/8.

level2Ability.description: Hurt: Summon one random tier 1 pet as a 16/16.

level3Ability.description: Hurt: Summon one random tier 1 pet as a 24/24.

level1Ability.description: Friend faints: Give one random friend +3   Attack and +2   Health.

level2Ability.description: Friend faints: Give one random friend +6  Attack and +4  Health.

level3Ability.description: Friend faints: Give one random friend +9   Attack and +6  Health.

level1Ability.description: Start of battle: Give one random friend without held food +1 attack and +1 health. Multiply with turn number.

level2Ability.description: Start of battle: Give one random friend without held food +2 attack and +2 health. Multiply with turn number.

level3Ability.description: Start of battle: Give one random friend without held food +3 attack and +3 [health. Multiply with turn number.

level1Ability.description: Start of battle: Give Coconut to one random Strawberry friend.

level2Ability.description: Start of battle: Give Coconut to two random Strawberry friends.

level3Ability.description: Start of battle: Give Coconut to three random Strawberry friend.

level1Ability.description: Before attack: Spend 4 Trumpet to gain Coconut perk. Works 1 time per battle.

level2Ability.description: Before attack: Spend 4 Trumpet to gain Coconut perk. Works 2 time per battle.

level3Ability.description: Before attack: Spend 4 Trumpet to gain Coconut perk. Works 3 time per battle.

level1Ability.description: Start of battle: Gain +1 trumpet for each 2 health this has.

level2Ability.description: Start of battle: Gain +2 trumpets for each 2 health this has.

level3Ability.description: Start of battle: Gain +3 trumpets for each 2 health this has.

level1Ability.description: Faint: Give random friends +1 attack and +1 health for every 3 attack this has.

level2Ability.description: Faint: Give random friends +2 attack and +2 health for every 3 attack this has.

level3Ability.description: Faint: Give random friends +3 attack and +3 health for every 3 attack this has.

level1Ability.description: Friend ahead attacks: Deal 20%  attack damage to one random enemy.

level2Ability.description: Friend ahead attacks: Deal 40%  attack damage to one random enemy.

level3Ability.description: Friend ahead attacks: Deal 60%  attack damage to one random enemy.

level1Ability.description: Sell: Gain +3 Gold.

level2Ability.description: Sell: Gain +6 Gold.

level3Ability.description: Sell: Gain +9 Gold.
